frame.name: Cache
frame.definition:
<def-root>A hidden <fen>Cache</fen> of a <fen>Resource</fen> is kept safe and available for later <fen>Use</fen>. The existence, location, and other information about the <fen>Cache</fen> is kept secret by the <fen>Possessor</fen>.
<ex>They no doubt had to move <fex name="pos">their</fex> <fex name="res">arms</fex> <t>cache</t> after several members defected.</ex>
<ex>Do you have a <t>stash</t> <fex name="res">of money</fex> somewhere?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Cache
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE denotes the <fen>Cache</fen> of <fen>Resource</fen>s. <ex>She concealed her <t>cache</t> of sweets under her sweater.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Resource
FE.definition:
<def-root>The goods or commodity that is being stored in a <fen>Cache</fen>.
<ex>This is by far the largest <t>cache</t> <fex name="res">of Roman coins</fex> to be uncovered in Britain since the eighteenth century.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Use
FE.definition:
<def-root>The future <fen>Use</fen> for the <fen>Resource</fen>.
<ex>Police discover <fex name="use">arms</fex> <t>cache</t> for school attack.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Possessor
FE.definition:
<def-root>The entity that possesses the <fen>Cache</fen>.
<ex>Eventually <fex name="pos">our</fex> <t>stash</t> ran out and we had to get more.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>A characterization of the <fen>Cache</fen> itself, rather than the <fen>Resource</fen>.
<ex>Police are questioning at least three people after discovering a <fex name="des">huge</fex> <t>cache</t> of semtex in a tea chest in East London.</ex></def-root>
